column3: Aman Rastogi is an AI/ML Engineer and Software Engineer based in Bengaluru, India. He has experience in building intelligent search systems, RAG pipelines, semantic retrieval, and multi-agent architectures. Aman is skilled in Python and Java and has worked with various tools and frameworks such as LangChain, LangGraph, Hugging Face, Vertex AI, and OpenAI to develop scalable LLM-powered applications. He has built end-to-end cloud-native systems using technologies like Next.js, FastAPI, Supabase, Redis, and Pinecone, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver AI-driven solutions for enterprise knowledge management, recruitment automation, and financial analytics. Aman is passionate about applying AI and advanced analytics to transform enterprise workflows.
